meanings.definition: The quality or state of being abnormal.
meanings.sent1: Her abnormity in the group made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the abnormity in the test results.
meanings.sent3: Despite his abnormity, he always found a way to make people smile.
meanings.sent4: The abnormity of the situation left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The abnormity of the painting caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The strange abnormity of the plant fascinated the botanist.
meanings.sent2: The abnormity of her eyes was striking.
meanings.sent3: His abnormity in always wearing mismatched socks became his trademark.
meanings.sent4: The abnormity of the old house added to its charm.
meanings.sent5: The abnormity of the rock formation made it a popular tourist spot.
